DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.Id, T1.GroupingId, T1.SpotDays, T5.value SourceCurrency, T6.value TargetCurrency, T1.PointsFactor, T8.value AdvanceCalendar, T9.value SpotRelative, T10.value AdditionalSettleCalendar FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsFX T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCurrencyCode T5 ON T1.SourceCurrency = T5.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCurrencyCode T6 ON T1.TargetCurrency = T6.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T8 ON T1.AdvanceCalendar = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T9 ON T1.SpotRelative = T9.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T10 ON T1.AdditionalSettleCalendar = T10.value

field.name: *SourceCurrency
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value SourceCurrency, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCurrencyCode !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *TargetCurrency
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value TargetCurrency, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCurrencyCode !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: AdvanceCalendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value AdvanceCalendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: SpotRelative
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value SpotRelative,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: AdditionalSettleCalendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value AdditionalSettleCalendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value
